Footer.company: MAJEN MADENCİLİK ENERJİ SAN. VE TİC. A.Ş.

address.title: Address
lines: Fener Mah. Lara Cad., Block F, Muhsin Adıyaman Sitesi

MainBanner.title1:
Transforming Spaces
with Exquisite Natural Stone.
MainBanner.description1: Marbléo Natural Stone is an innovative marble supplier known for its exceptional quality and distinctive designs featured in our extensive portfolio of over 40 products. With our diverse range of more than 500 material references.
MainBanner.title2:
Elevate Your Projects
with Timeless Elegance.
MainBanner.description2: From classic to contemporary, our hand-picked selection of natural stones adds unparalleled beauty and durability to every design. Explore our complete catalog and find the perfect match for your vision.

InfoSection.subtitle: PRODUCT GROUPS
InfoSection.heading: Top Choices in Natural Stone
InfoSection.description: We deliver durable, aesthetic solutions tailored to your projects.

product1.title: Block
product1.description: Carefully selected quarry blocks with consistent color and texture—ideal yield for fabrication and large-scale projects.

product2.title: Slabs
product2.description: 2 cm and 3 cm thickness options with polished, honed, or brushed finishes; precisely calibrated and reinforced—perfect for book-matching.

product3.title: Tiles
product3.description: Standard sizes like 30×60, 60×60, 60×120; rectified edges and tight tolerances for fast, clean installation indoors and outdoors.

product4.title: Special Designs
product4.description: Custom waterjet cuts, mosaic blends, CNC carving, and 3D panels—dimensioned to your specs and delivered ready to install.

quality.title: Unmatched Quality
quality.description: Quarry-selected blocks and strict QC ensure consistent color/texture and long-term durability.

design.title: Unique Designs
design.description: Waterjet, mosaic and book-match applications deliver project-specific, refined aesthetics.

range.title: Extensive Material Range
range.description: 500+ material references and strong stock for on-time supply and seamless workflows.

custom.title: Customization Options
custom.description: CNC machining, bespoke sizes and surface finishes tailored precisely to your project.

sustain.title: Sustainable Sourcing
sustain.description: Responsible quarrying and waste reduction practices to minimize environmental impact.

expert.title: Expert Guidance
expert.description: Technical surveys, sample management and application advice for end-to-end project support.

item1.title: Combining a Passion for Natural Beauty with Exceptional Quality
item1.description: With a global partner network, we adapt to diverse technical requirements and scales—from hotel chains to palaces and mosques—delivering on time and to spec.
item1.alt: Modern interior featuring natural stone surfaces

item2.title: From Quarry to Project: Traceable, On-Time, Reliable
item2.description: Block selection, slab preparation, calibration & reinforcement, project-based cutting. Tight tolerances and consistent finishes shorten on-site installation.

item3.title: Custom Cuts & Finishes Tailored to Your Design
item3.description: Waterjet mosaics, CNC carving and 3D panels—delivered dimensionally accurate and ready to install. A perfect match for premium hospitality and residential.
item3.alt: Natural stone with waterjet and mosaic details

block.title: Travertine Block
block.intro: Quarry-selected blocks with uniform texture for high yield and quality.

slabs.title: Slabs
slabs.intro: 2 cm/3 cm thickness; polished/honed/brushed finishes; great for book-matching.

tiles.title: Tiles
tiles.intro: Standard sizes for interior/exterior; rectified edges for fast, clean installation.

special.title: Special Designs
special.intro: Custom waterjet, mosaic blends, CNC carving & 3D panels—tailored to your specs.
